1 Secchi Depth 1.0.1 Interagency Ecological Program Spring Season report 1.1 Background Organisms in this ecosystem are adapted to high turbidity conditions, and reductions in turbidity can have many negative ecological effects. Higher values for Secchi depth indicate lower turbidity. Secchi depth is measured monthly by DWRâ€™s Environmental Monitoring Program by dropping a black-and-white disk in the water until it disappears. 1.2 San Pablo Bay Suisun Bay Delta
